text: haey nowpel del puokke ban br pru td ampeuaeakrak puok ke tengte niyeay tha puok yeung ban ttuol vea pi chidaunchitea robsa yeung haey a l laoh ban banhchea puok yeung aoy thveu vea . chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh min banhchea aoy thveu akrak noh laey . tae puok anak kampoungte niyeay bamphlaesa leu a l laoh nouv avei del puok anak mindoeng ryy
